review_body: Why remember the currency rates and use caluculators for conversions if u can just use the app to know the updated currencies and conversions. Great app.
Ease of use and GUI looks well.
I have tried a lot of apps with similar purpose but this is by far the best. Easy to use. Beautiful design.You guys are the best. Thanks.
Great application to find past and present value of your currency to other currency.
One place to know all the currency rates, awesome app👍
👍 Awesome app to compare currency rates 💱
